definition: the chirping of birds or insects/noise/clamor/buzzing/disturbance

sentences.english: But maybe you choose to be in a noisy environment?
sentences.chinese: 但也許是你選擇住在一個噪雜的環境中呢？

sentences.english: She was wearied by the constant noise.
sentences.chinese: 她很厭煩那些沒完沒了的噪雜聲。

sentences.english: Thestreets in the city have gotten noisier.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市裏的街道已經變得很噪雜。

sentences.english: What if you are older, and you are not at all looking forward to join those noisy crowds of young students ?
sentences.chinese: 或者你不再年輕，又不想加入年輕學生的噪雜人羣呢？

sentences.english: Introverts are not thrill seekers and adrenaline junkies.
sentences.chinese: 內向者不喜歡噪雜的環境和刺激的體驗。

sentences.english: All this noise and bustle will drive me mad.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些噪雜喧鬧快把我逼瘋了。
